mapper.select: select sp.mber_id, FN_GET_MBER_NM(sp.mber_id) mber_nm, s.schul_code, s.schul_nm from family_relate fr inner join schul_psitn_mber sp on sp.mber_id = fr.stdnt_id inner join schul s on s.schul_code = sp.schul_code where stdnprnt_id = #{mberId}

select c.clas_code , s.schul_nm , cd.cmmn_detail_code_nm , c.clas_nm from clas c inner join clas_stdnt cs on c.clas_code = cs.clas_code inner join schul s on s.schul_code = c.schul_code inner join cmmn_detail_code cd on cd.cmmn_detail_code = c.cmmn_grade where cs.mber_id = #{mberId} and s.schul_code = #{schulCode} and c.cmmn_clas_sttus = 'A16001' and cs.cmmn_clas_psitn_sttus = 'A03101'

select c.clas_code , s.schul_nm , cd.cmmn_detail_code_nm , c.clas_nm from clas c inner join hrtchr h on c.clas_code = h.clas_code inner join schul s on s.schul_code = c.schul_code inner join cmmn_detail_code cd on cd.cmmn_detail_code = c.cmmn_grade where h.mber_id = #{mberId} and s.schul_code = #{schulCode} and c.cmmn_clas_sttus = 'A16001' and h.cmmn_detail_code = 'A03101'

select m.mber_id , m.mber_nm , s.schul_nm , cd.cmmn_detail_code_nm , c.clas_nm , c.clas_code from family_relate fr inner join member m on fr.stdnt_id = mber_id inner join schul s on fr.schul_code = s.schul_code inner join clas_stdnt cs on cs.mber_id = fr.stdnt_id inner join clas c on c.clas_code = cs.clas_code inner join cmmn_detail_code cd on cd.cmmn_detail_code = c.cmmn_grade inner join CHLDRN_CLAS chc on chc.MBER_ID = fr.stdnprnt_id where fr.stdnprnt_id = #{mberId} and s.schul_code = #{schulCode} and cs.cmmn_clas_psitn_sttus = 'A03101' and c.cmmn_clas_sttus = 'A16001'

select d.DIET_CODE, d.DIET_DE, d.DIET_MENU, d.SCHUL_CODE from schul s left join (select to_char(to_date(st_dt)+level -1,'yyyy-mm-dd') day from ( select sysdate st_dt, sysdate+1 end_dt from dual ) connect by level <= to_date(end_dt) - to_date(st_dt) +1) day on 1=1 left join diet d on d.diet_de = day.day and d.schul_code = s.schul_code where s.schul_code = #{schulCode} order by day.day, s.schul_code
